alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Madison; Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 31 at 9:35PM EDT until further notice by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Florida... Aucilla River at Lamont (US 27) affecting Jefferson, Taylor and Madison Counties. For the Aucilla River...including Lamont (US 27)...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Aucilla River at Lamont (US 27). * WHEN...From late Friday night until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 53.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding begins. At 55.0 feet, Widespread lowland flooding will occur. Water will approach a few houses on US Highway 27. At 56.0 feet, A few houses near US Highway 27 will flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM EDT Thursday the stage was 51.7 feet. - Bankfull stage is 11.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Saturday morning and continue rising to a crest of 54.0 feet early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 53.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 52.5 feet on 01/10/2021. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday afternoon at 345 PM EDT.
